definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: We must reinforce the relief material for the disaster-hit area.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须增加给受灾地区的救灾物资。

sentences.english: Power grids have been destructed badly in the disaster-stricken areas.
sentences.chinese: 一是受灾地区电网遭到严重破坏。

sentences.english: The tremor caused widespread blackouts in affected areas.
sentences.chinese: 该震动导致受灾地区大范围停电。

sentences.english: They supplied the people in the flood-stricken area with food aids.
sentences.chinese: 他们向受灾地区的人们提供了食品援助。

sentences.english: The affected area is part of a seismically active zone.
sentences.chinese: 受灾地区属于地震活动区。

sentences.english: On-the-ground reports from the badly affected areas are few and incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 从严重受灾地区发来的地面报道仍然稀少且不完整。

sentences.english: Once again, all the flooding was along the coastline, a backwash up the rivers.
sentences.chinese: 再一次地，所有受灾地区都是沿海，河水的回流。

sentences.english: Farmers in drought-stricken areas would get subsidies from the central government, he said.
sentences.chinese: 受灾地区的农民将得到中央政府的补贴，他说。

sentences.english: Early into the second relief to the affected areas, we can save a life back.
sentences.chinese: 救援者早一秒进入受灾地区，就能早抢救出一个生命。

sentences.english: Fishermen have been advised against going out to sea in affected areas, Kompas said.
sentences.chinese: 这家报纸还说，政府劝告受灾地区的渔民不要出海。

sentences.english: We will try to compensate for the losses in quake-affected areas using supplies from other areas.
sentences.chinese: 我们将尝试从其它地区保障受灾地区。

definition: disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
to provide relief during times of emergency and disaster (idiom)
